eric-chinje.greeting: Greetings, The map folds open with your presence affirming the foundation. Welcome home.

ron-borges.greeting: Ronny. Together, we can do it all. You've been protected. Now, protect.

jamal-ward.greeting: Wata Falcon. We take flight with you, fearlessly. Thank you for your relentless guidance.

khalil-cade.greeting: Kali, dig deeper lad. What a wonderous creature you. Derobe from the cloths of despair. Breathe in. There's air.
